safety.comment: Safety MCP Server (SSE) for real-time package vulnerability intelligence

setup: 1. Install Safety CLI: pip install safety
2. Optional: Authenticate Safety CLI: safety auth login
3. Update paths in this config to match your system
5. Test with: pr_review tool with focus_security=true
notes: Safety MCP uses hosted SSE endpoint - no local installation needed
Authentication is optional but provides enhanced vulnerability data
The curl command streams real-time package intelligence
verification: Run pr_review on a repo with requirements.txt changes
Check logs for: '[PR_REVIEW] Safety MCP enabled' messages
Look for package vulnerability intelligence in review output
